resources.string: You seem to not be connected to the internet. Please check your connection and try again.
Loading Apps List...This could take a while, please be patient.

1- Choose a Google account to which synchronize your applications information (The apps info will be saved in a new task list called "SaveMyAppsDefaultList" in your account, you can later access this list on your browser by accessing to your GMail account).

 2- Choose an app (or a group of them) by checking or un-checking the checkboxes on the right side.

 3- Press the corresponding button (located on the top) to the action you want to perform on the chosen apps ("Save Apps To Server" or "Remove Apps From Server", when I say "server" I mean your GMail account, since that is where the apps information will be saved as mentioned earlier).

 * References:
\nIndicates that the information of the app listed next to it is already saved in the server.
\nIndicates that the information of the app listed next to it is NOT saved in the server.

* What will come:

 	I have several new features that I have in mind and I'll be adding to the app as soon as I have time to work on them so stay tuned :-).

 * Feedback:

 	If you have any suggestions, complaints or whatever about the app you can contact me by email to cool.apps.android@gmail.com
